name: jz
description: Minimal modern functional JS subset that compiles to WebAssembly

scripts.test: npm run test:gc-true && npm run test:gc-false
scripts.test:gc-true: echo '\n=== Running tests with GC=true ===' && GC=true node test/index.js
scripts.test:gc-false: echo '\n=== Running tests with GC=false ===' && GC=false node test/index.js
